first_phrase: In the last part of this text, various techniques and exercises are discussed, including self-hypnosis, the Campanelli Method, and how to deal with burnout. The section also delves into Hermeticism and quantum physics, exploring the symbols and elements and how they relate to our consciousness. Specific exercises are provided for creating change, balance, and harmony within ourselves. Additionally, the Trabona Method and Modified Akstein Method are introduced as ways to move and work on problems, respectively. Overall, this section offers a comprehensive approach to healing and self-discovery.
content: The answer will come in form of a sensation And in this moment you will feel FREE You can work on different identifications - being imperfect - being inadequate - being incomplete ============================================ Fifth day We will delve a moment in Hermeticism and Quantum Physics SYMBOLS The first symbol is the circle, in some way it is the whole, the DAO It divides itself in sun and moon because we live in an EXPLICATE order This division will create soon and moon, the two opposites, because the word is done of opposites The circle with a line is the symbol of the salt and it is the symbol of the body QUANTUM PHYSICS Why we speak of an implicate order behind the explicate? Do attention on the space between each breath What is between each breath? There is YOU Hermeticism and quantum physics are linked.
last_phrase: In conclusion, hermeticism and quantum physics intertwine in their understanding of symbols, and there is a relationship between our inner psyche and the symbolism we express in our physical touch. By exploring the symbols of the elements and understanding the archetypal and derivative nature of symbols, we can work on de-identifying and breaking patterns of behavior. Through exercises like the Enneagram and Indian Self Hypnosis, we can learn to access our inner senses and increase our sensitivity to the universe, ultimately leading to a greater sense of freedom and self-awareness.
